mapper.insert: insert into slice_arrangement (slice_arrangement_id, cinema_id, movie_id, screening_room_id, slice_arrangement_start_time, vote_price, layout, slice_arrangement_end_time) values (#{sliceArrangement.sliceArrangementId}, #{sliceArrangement.cinemaId}, #{sliceArrangement.movieId}, #{sliceArrangement.screeningRoomId}, #{sliceArrangement.sliceArrangementStartTime}, #{sliceArrangement.votePrice}, #{sliceArrangement.layout}, #{sliceArrangement.sliceArrangementEndTime})
mapper.select: select * from slice_arrangement where screening_room_id=#{screeningRoomId} and (#{startTime} > slice_arrangement_start_time and #{startTime} < slice_arrangement_end_time or #{endTime} > slice_arrangement_start_time and #{endTime} < slice_arrangement_end_time or #{startTime} <= slice_arrangement_start_time and #{endTime} <= slice_arrangement_end_time)
select count(slice_arrangement_id) from slice_arrangement where slice_arrangement_start_time > DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)
